reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://install.devi7.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Click the 'Modules' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Modules dialog'.
Enter 'Pub Social' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Pub Social' to appear in the list.
Verify the 'Pub Social' check box is checked.
Enter 'Twitter' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Twitter' to appear in the list.
Verify the 'Twitter' check box is checked.
Enter 'Twitter Post' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Twitter Post' to appear in the list.
Verify the 'Twitter Post' check box is checked.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Web services' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Twitter' menu link.
Click the 'Settings' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Twitter dialog'.
Enter the key in the 'OAuth Consumer Key' text box.
Enter the secret in the 'OAuth Consumer Secret' text box.
Click the 'Save configuration' button.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Web services' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Twitter' menu link.
Click the 'Post' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Twitter dialog'.
Check the 'Post' checkbox.
Click the 'Save configuration' button.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Web services' menu link.
Click the 'Twitter' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Twitter dialog'.
Click the 'Go to Twitter to add an authenticated account' button.
Enter 'publisherseven' in the 'Userame or email' text box.
Enter 'Publ!$her' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Authorize App' button.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Post' menu link.
Enter '80c5067d866346c' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Published' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post 80c5067d866346c has been created.' is present.
Click the 'Revisions' link in the work bench.
Switch to frame titled 'Revisions'.
Click the 'Edit' extend menu button.
Click the 'Share' menu button.
Click the 'Twitter' link.
Check the 'Post to Twitter' check box.
Enter '1fd5363db2264b6fb9bd99684' in the 'Tweet' text area.
Click the 'Share' button.
Verify the text 'Publisher Seven' is present on the page.
Verify the text '1fd5363db2264b6fb9bd99684' is present on the page.
